name: Ocean Data Viewer - UNEP-WCMC
description: Contemporary datasets on Ocean+ Data Viewer will remain available under the Ocean+ tag on the UNEP-WCMC GIS Portal. A small number of older datasets are being archived. The website provides datasets on ocean habitats, including coral, mangrove, seagrass, saltmarsh, and cold-water coral, supporting environmental research, conservation, and policy.
owner_name: UNEP-WCMC (United Nations Environment Programme World Conservation Monitoring Centre)
